name: TechStudio Solutions Pte Ltd
overview:
TechStudio Solutions is a Mobile & Internet technologies company that is established since 2002 with offices in Singapore, China, Thailand and Malaysia. The company focuses on delivering innovative value-added solutions to the clients in the region.

We pride ourselves for having successfully deployed mobile and Internet value-added solutions regionally and aim to continuously collaborate with our clients to explore and create new business opportunities by leveraging on the evolving technologies, such as WAP, SMS, MMS, Java, Symbian, Video Streaming, iPhone, Android and etc.

Partnering with Global Systems Integrators, Infrastructure Vendors and International Gateway Providers, TechStudio Solutions provides a one-stop station for our clients in offering their products and services from consultation, solutions design and implementation to hosting and maintenance. With clients such as Mobile Operators, Mobile Aggregators and Content/Service Providers, TechStudio Solutions aims to continue providing the highest value and satisfaction to our clients.
